cause.description:
A proper financial plan will ensure your economic success and advancement through all of lifes different stages.
Early Career
Beginning a family
Wealth Accumulation
Wealth Conservation
Wealth Distribution
Not having a plan and not having measurable or quantifiable benchmarks means you do not know if you are achieving or not achieving certain financial goals.
1. no matter how old you are you must enact a plan
2. the old addage applies those who fail to plan, plan to fail
3. the financial plan is not the domain of the baby boomer or the high income earner
cause.name: Financial Planning for the Facebook Generation
